ticket.title: Cannot "interact with the existing tickets" on trac
ticket.original-body:
http://dev.rubyonrails.org/ says:
"This trac site only remains to deal with the existing tickets and patches that were posted to it before we switched to Git and Lighthouse. So please do continue to interact with the existing tickets..."
I would like to interact with ticket 8954 (http://dev.rubyonrails.org/ticket/8954), however I cannot do so. Despite logging in with my account, I have no option to create comments. Please advise me how to do so.

version.title: Cannot "interact with the existing tickets" on trac

version.body: Trac comments were recently disabled due to an increasing spam problem. At this point, I don't think anyone will mind if you open a new Lighthouse issue with a pointer to the old Trac ticket, especially if you have a patch that applies cleanly against current edge.
version.body-html: Trac comments were recently disabled due to an increasing spam problem. At this point, I don't think anyone will mind if you open a new Lighthouse issue with a pointer to the old Trac ticket, especially if you have a patch that applies cleanly against current edge.
version.title: Cannot "interact with the existing tickets" on trac

version.body: In that case, might I suggest editing the text on dev.rubyonrails.org to reflect that?
version.body-html: In that case, might I suggest editing the text on dev.rubyonrails.org to reflect that?
version.title: Cannot "interact with the existing tickets" on trac
